subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: In the year’s most unforgettable soccer matches, Bayern Munich crushed Barcelona in the Champions League semifinals and Brazil trounced Spain to take the Confederations Cup.
snippet: In the year’s most unforgettable soccer matches, Bayern Munich crushed Barcelona in the Champions League semifinals and Brazil trounced Spain to take the Confederations Cup.
